20101202212426.000|20101202212431.000|CCO|WEATHER, 20 DEGREES BELOW ZERO, 
20101202212431.000|20101202212434.333|CCO|CHINESE SURROUNDED US AND 
20101202212434.333|20101202212437.667|CCO|ATTACKED AND THERE WERE HUNDREDS

20101202212441.000|20101202212444.333|CCO|KILLED, CAPTURED.
20101202212444.333|20101202212447.667|CCO|THEY SCREAMED AND WERE HEARD AND
20101202212447.667|20101202212451.000|CCO|I WAS WOUNDED AND HAD NO 
20101202212451.000|20101202212453.500|CCO|THOUGHTS THAT I WOULD BE ABLE TO

20101202212501.000|20101202212503.500|CCO|FIND MY WAY OUT OF THE 
20101202212503.500|20101202212506.000|CCO|ENTRAPMENT AND FOR THREE DAYS I 
20101202212506.000|20101202212508.500|CCO|HAD THE STRENGTH TO LEAD 40 OF 
20101202212508.500|20101202212511.000|CCO|MY COMRADES OUT OF THAT 
20101202212511.000|20101202212516.000|CCO|SITUATION AND WE ALL WERE 
20101202212516.000|20101202212521.000|CCO|HEARTED BY THE FACT THAT SO MANY
20101202212521.000|20101202212523.000|CCO|OF MY COMRADES DID NOT SURVIVE.
20101202212523.000|20101202212525.000|CCO|I TELL YOU THAT STORY NOT FOR 
20101202212525.000|20101202212527.000|CCO|SYMPATHY BUT TO LET YOU KNOW 
20101202212527.000|20101202212529.000|CCO|THAT AT THAT TIME IN EVERY SENSE

20101202212606.000|20101202212611.000|CCO|RULES ARE MADE TO BE ENFORCED 
20101202212611.000|20101202212621.000|CCO|AND THAT WE IN THE CONGRESS AND 
20101202212621.000|20101202212624.333|CCO|SENIOR MEMBERS ACT IN A WAY AS A

20101202212631.000|20101202212633.500|CCO|GROUNDS, I ASK FOR FAIRNESS,

20101202212636.000|20101202212638.500|CCO|HISTORY OF THIS GREAT COUNTRY

20101202212641.000|20101202212643.500|CCO|HUMILIATION OF A CENSURE WHEN 
20101202212643.500|20101202212646.000|CCO|THE RECORD IS ABUNDANTLY CLEARED

20101202212701.000|20101202212704.333|CCO|FOUND NO EVIDENCE OF CORRUPTION,
20101202212704.333|20101202212707.667|CCO|FOUND NO EVIDENCE OF 
20101202212707.667|20101202212711.000|CCO|SELF-ENRICHMENT, NO EVIDENCE 
20101202212711.000|20101202212716.000|CCO|THAT THERE WAS AN INTENTION ON 
20101202212716.000|20101202212721.000|CCO|MY PART OF TAXES OR WHETHER IN 
20101202212721.000|20101202212731.000|CCO|FINANCIAL DISCLOSURES AND MY

20101202213802.250|20101202213803.500|CCO|PRESIDENT YET AND WE JUST WANT

20101202213807.250|20101202213808.500|CCO|>> AWKWARD.
20101202213808.500|20101202213809.750|CCO|JIM, STAY WARM.

20101202215845.286|20101202215846.714|CCO|IS BOTHER SOME.
20101202215846.714|20101202215848.143|CCO|TWO DETENTION OFFICERS ARE HERE 
20101202215848.143|20101202215849.571|CCO|AND A COUPLE MILLING ABOUT.
20101202215849.571|20101202215851.000|CCO|NO ONE IS DOING ANYTHING?
20101202215851.000|20101202215852.250|CCO|>> NO ONE IS DOING ANYTHING.
20101202215852.250|20101202215853.500|CCO|THIS IS NOT TYPICAL PROTOCOL.
20101202215853.500|20101202215854.750|CCO|THIS IS NOT SOMETHING THAT 
20101202215854.750|20101202215856.000|CCO|HAPPENS OFTEN AS YOU CAN SEE.
20101202215856.000|20101202215857.250|CCO|THERE ARE OTHER PEOPLE WALKING 
20101202215857.250|20101202215858.500|CCO|AROUND.
20101202215858.500|20101202215859.750|CCO|THIS WAS VIDEOTAPED AND 
20101202215859.750|20101202215901.000|CCO|APPARENTLY IT CAME TO LIGHT 
20101202215901.000|20101202215902.429|CCO|BECAUSE OTHER DETENTION OFFICERS
20101202215902.429|20101202215903.857|CCO|REPORTED IT.
20101202215903.857|20101202215905.286|CCO|THIS IS HIGHLY UNUSUAL.
20101202215905.286|20101202215906.714|CCO|THESE THINGS DON'T HAPPEN.
20101202215906.714|20101202215908.143|CCO|AND I COMMEND ACTUALLY THE 
20101202215908.143|20101202215909.571|CCO|SHERIFF'S OFFICE AND THE 
20101202215909.571|20101202215911.000|CCO|DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS FOR 
20101202215911.000|20101202215914.333|CCO|BEING COMPLETELY TRANSPARENT AND
20101202215914.333|20101202215917.667|CCO|COMING FORWARD AND SAYING, WE 
20101202215917.667|20101202215921.000|CCO|DON'T APPROVE OF THIS AND WE'RE 
20101202215921.000|20101202215923.000|CCO|GOING TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT. 
20101202215923.000|20101202215925.000|CCO|>> COULD THEY BE CHARGED?
20101202215925.000|20101202215927.000|CCO|>> CERTAINLY THIS OFFICER WILL 
20101202215927.000|20101202215929.000|CCO|BE CHARGED WITH ASSAULT.
20101202215929.000|20101202215931.000|CCO|ANOTHER OFFICER WENT AND PUSHED 
20101202215931.000|20101202215933.000|CCO|THE INMATE'S HEAD DOWN, SAYING 
20101202215933.000|20101202215935.000|CCO|THAT HE WAS TRYING TO KEEP 
20101202215935.000|20101202215937.000|CCO|CONTROL.
20101202215937.000|20101202215939.000|CCO|BUT, STILL, COMPLETELY 
20101202215939.000|20101202215941.000|CCO|INAPPROPRIATE.

20101202215942.111|20101202215943.222|CCO|I WOULD IMAGINE THAT THE OTHER 
20101202215943.222|20101202215944.333|CCO|OFFICER IS GOING TO BE CHARGED

20101202215945.444|20101202215946.556|CCO|>> AND SHERIFF ARPAIO, AS YOU 
20101202215946.556|20101202215947.667|CCO|MENTIONED, HE RELEASED THE VIDEO
